column6:
Excalibur is back, just the way you like them! From the ashes of House of M a new Excalibur team is formed to combat the aftereffects of this cataclysmic event! Witness the birth of Captain Britain's new team forming, as a sinister force already tries to tear them apart! Starring Dazzler, Juggernaut, Nocturne and Pete Wisdom!! Guest-starring the Uncanny X-Men!,2005,11
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column7: | Captain Britain | Dazzler | Excalibur | Juggernaut | Nocturne | Pete Wisdom
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | inker:Rick Ketcham | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | colorist:Peter Pantazis | penciller (cover):Michael Ryan
